forecast.detailedForecast: Drizzle. Mostly cloudy. Low around 47, with temperatures rising to around 49 overnight. South southwest wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Drizzle before 10am, then rain. Cloudy. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. South southeast wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As a quivering mist cloaks Downtown San Francisco, the evening air is thick with the promise of rain, grim but mesmerising. Tonight, Drizzle will weave through the cityscape, softening the outlines of familiar landmarks under a curtain of clouds. The temperature will hover around the cool touch of 47 degrees, whispering a gentle reminder of warmth required to ward off the creeping chill of the south-southwest wind. With an 80% chance of precipitation, expect a light, persistent drizzle that might dampen plans for leisurely strolls along the waterfront or any open-air dining. Instead, the enveloping clouds may leave the Golden Gate Bridge shrouded in mystery, a shimmering silhouette against the night.

Looking ahead to Friday, the promise of rain intensifies with relentless showers arriving before the day settles in. The skies will remain heavily overcast and the high will barely break 56 degrees, with temperatures gradually dropping in the afternoon. A brisk southeast wind will carry gusts that excite the senses, warning against any rash decisions to explore the hills without adequate layers. The day will beg for cozy interiors, perhaps a quiet café with steaming cups of coffee and the comforting embrace of friendly chat, or curling up with a book while the rain courses down windowpanes outside. Dressing in layers, with a reliable rain jacket and perhaps even a scarf, would invite a sense of comfort in the dismal but intimate atmosphere. For those feeling adventurous, a scenic drive through the city’s misty corners might reveal the hidden beauty of this moody weather, where the stark groom of the streets holds an unexpected charm.
